list.abs: this is one of the hidden features of the political machine : the callow age of many its cogs , including some big ones .政治这部机器中许多小齿轮，包括一些大的，他们年轻的年龄是是政治机器隐藏的特点之一。
callousity 茧胼胝callow 幼稚乳臭未乾callow thinking 幼稚想法callowness callus 胼胝茧子硬瘤
A callow youth ., 一个尚未成熟的青年.
he was only a callow youth ., 他只是个无经验的年轻人.

means.word_mean: 1. lacking and evidencing lack of experience of life
